info:
Talk to your instructor, and accept your first quest.

Use 'Hammer Fire' - to start a dialog.
Use 'F4 (Vote NO)' - to communicate during a dialog.
Use the arrows on your keyboard to go down.
Use the jump to get past the obstacles.
Keep moving forward, you're doing well!
Now combine movement and the use of jumps.
Now let's try use the hook.
Now let's complicate things a bit with the hook.
Press TAB. Look at the list of players.

Select the 'Call vote' tab.
After select tab 'Settings' from the menu.

There you can find the basic settings of the player.
And also the setting of modules on the character
Press 'Backpage'. To go back to the menu selection.

Talk to an NPC. And complete your first quest!

Use 'Hammer Fire' - to start a dialog.
Use 'F4 (Vote NO)' - to communicate during a dialog.
